extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by identifying the control block model and version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Which control block model is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Replace CPX-CEC-C1 with CPX-CEC-C1-V3
extracted_playbook.description: Replace the affected CPX-CEC-C1 control block with the follow-up product CPX-CEC-C1-V3.

extracted_playbook.title: Replace CPX-CMXX with CPX-CEC-M1-V3
extracted_playbook.description: Replace the affected CPX-CMXX control block with the follow-up product CPX-CEC-M1-V3.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Protected Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Use controllers and devices only in a protected environment to minimize network exposure and ensure that they are not accessible from outside.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Use firewalls to protect and separate the control system network from other networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use VPN for Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Use VPN (Virtual Private Networks) tunnels if remote access is required.

extracted_playbook.title: Activate User Management and Password Features
extracted_playbook.description: Activate and apply user management and password features to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Encrypted Communication Links
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that communication links are encrypted to protect data in transit.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Access and Use Antivirus Solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to both development and control systems by physical means and operating system features. Protect systems with up-to-date virus detection solutions.
